author: Priscilla Jebaraj
title: Coronavirus | Government caps spending amid cash crunch
description: However, departments deemed crucial in fight against virus will not be affected
content:
With the Centre expecting an extreme cash crunch due to the COVID-19 crisis, most Central government departments have been asked to cut their first quarter expenditure to 15-20% of the years budget estimates (BE).
Departments considered crucial to dealing wi… [+2824 chars]
